title: Supersecure, Falcon-i sign agreement
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 31 (APP): Supersecure, the Managed Security Service Provider (MSSP) and Falcon-i, the leading vehicle-tracking company of Pakistan have signed an agreement for Fully Managed SOC As-a-Service (SOC365®) to monitor, detect, report, and remediate the security issues at Falcon-i.
The solution will help Falcon-i not only comply with local and international compliance regulations but will also harden its security posture against the ever-changing cyber threat landscape.
This agreement will allow Supersecure to implement its premium managed security services offering called SOC365®, a turnkey SOC along with the most advanced threat detection and response capabilities at Falcon-i Pvt Ltd. to make sure their business operations remain protected and continue to provide services to their customers without interruptions, said a news release.
SOC365® provides full spectrum visibility of the security health status of on-prem, remote, and cloud assets with real-time monitoring and alerting by human expertise around the clock 24x7x365. SOC365® combines people, processes, and technology to bring operationally and cost efficiency for the organizations.
It includes the deployment of XDR-based Next-Generation SIEM Platform, breach detection capabilities, a vulnerability management platform, environment hardening with security policies based on NIST Cybersecurity Framework and CIS20 Controls.
The signing ceremony was attended by senior management from Falcon-i and Supersecure.  Supersecure was represented by their Chairman, Shams ul Arfeen, CEO Jamal Nasir, Business Head, Sohail Hyder, and VP Sales  Hassan Jafri. Falcon-i was represented by their CEO Saad Salman, COO Ebrahim Tiwana, VP Technology, and  Innovation Ahmed Faraz and Country Head Sales Naveed Aijaz Speaking on the occasion Saad Salman, CEO, Falcon-i Pvt. Ltd.
acknowledged the product’s effectiveness and said, “After rigorous technical evaluations we have selected Supersecure as our MSSP and opted to their SOC365® services for both security monitoring and regulatory compliance.
It is a highly effective solution and provides extremely valuable insight into the digital assets deployed by the company. The solution will highly facilitate Falcon-i to become one of the first companies within the tracking and fleet management segment to be fully compliant with the regulations issued by PTA.
We are extremely happy with the advanced onboarding and managed services provided by SuperSecure.”  Jamal Nasir, CEO Supersecure thanked Falcon-i and commented at the occasion, ”We are committed to delivering innovative next-generation IT security solutions and services that help our valued clients protect their network against the constantly evolving and sophisticated cyber threat landscape.
It is a great opportunity to deliver critical information security services to one of the fastest-growing IT and Tracking Companies in Pakistan.”
